metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25743 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: hw/ide/pci.c in QEMU before 5.1.1 can trigger a NULL pointer dereference because it lacks a pointer check before an ide_cancel_dma_sync call.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Sergej Schumilo, Cornelius Aschermann, Simon Wrner

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2022-09-12, the proposed patch has not been commited upstream

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
